steps.title: Plan for the Meeting
steps.description: You'll want to make sure that you have all the topics you want to discuss planned in advance so that you are prepared

steps.title: Assign An Agenda
steps.description: Choose the most pressing discussion topics for the upcoming meeting

steps.title: Start the Meeting
steps.description: Call the meeting to a start by requesting everyone's attention

steps.title: Record Attendance
steps.description: Making sure that everyone is active in the discussion is very important

steps.title: Take Charge
steps.description: Make clear that you are the one leading the meeting

steps.title: Leave Room for Discussion
steps.description: Between each topic, make sure to leave some space for commentary and insight from participants

steps.title: Reserve Time for Other Speakers
steps.description: There may be others with important information for the participants.

steps.title: Summarize All Topics Covered
steps.description: This is a run down of everything covered.

steps.title: Assign Roles and Tasks
steps.description: Make sure that the participants know what they need to complete post-meeting

steps.title: Call The Meeting To An End
steps.description: Make sure that there is a definite end to the meeting.

steps.title: Record Any Input Received
steps.description: This will better help you prepare for future meetings and make decisions.

steps.title: Plan the Next Meeting
steps.description: If neccesary, schedule the next meeting and send out invitations.
